mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM , A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD , S.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM , A.CLNT_PJT , R4.CODE_NM AS CLNT_PJT_NM , A.ORDRS_NO , TO_CHAR(A.ORDRS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDRS_DT , A.ORDRS_DIV , R1.CODE_NM AS ORDRS_DIV_NM , A.CTRT_NM , A.CURR_CD , R2.CODE_NM AS CURR_NM , NVL(A.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(A.ORDRS_AMT, 0) AS ORDRS_AMT , P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV , R3.CODE_NM AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV_NM , P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ, 1)) || ' 차' AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0) AS CLMN_RATE , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0)) || ' %' AS CLMN_RATE_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) AS PLAN_CLMN_AMT , TO_CHAR(P.BILL_PBLS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BILL_PBLS_DT , TO_CHAR(P.CLMN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLMN_DT , NVL(C.CLMN_AMT, 0) AS BEF_CLMN_AMT , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) - NVL(C.CLMN_AMT, 0) AS MI_CLMN_AMT , '' AS CLMN_NO , 'N' AS CHK --체크여부 , 0 AS CLMN_DTL_AMT , 0 AS INPUT_CLMN_DTL_AMT , 'I' AS DATA_CHK FROM TB_CR02M01 AS A --수주 --수금계획 JOIN TB_CR02D01 AS P ON P.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND P.ORDRS_NO = A.ORDRS_NO --수금합계 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CM.CO_CD , CD.ORDRS_NO , CD.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , CM.CURR_CD , NVL(CM.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , SUM(NVL(CD.CLMN_DTL_AMT, 0)) AS CLMN_AMT FROM TB_CR05M01 AS CM --수금 --수금상세 JOIN TB_CR05D01 AS CD ON CD.CO_CD = CM.CO_CD AND CD.CLMN_NO = CM.CLMN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY CM.CO_CD , CD.ORDRS_NO , CD.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , CM.CURR_CD , NVL(CM.EXRATE, 1) ) AS C ON C.CO_CD = P.CO_CD AND C.ORDRS_NO = P.ORDRS_NO AND C.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ = P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ --회사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD --수주구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = A.ORDRS_DIV --통화단위 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = A.CURR_CD --수금계획구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV --고객사PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = A.CLNT_PJT --고객사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS S ON S.CLNT_CD = A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, A.ORDRS_NO, P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MI_CLMN_AMT > 0 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD = #{ordrsClntCd} AND A.CURR_CD = #{currCd}

SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , A.CLMN_NO , A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD , S.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CLMN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLMN_DT , A.CURR_CD , A.PMNTMTD_CD , A.BKAC_CD , NVL(A.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(B.CLMN_DTL_AMT, 0) AS CLMN_AMT , A.CLMN_RMK , A.ETC_FIELD1 , A.ETC_FIELD2 , A.ETC_FIELD3 , A.CREAT_ID , U1.NAME AS CREAT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , A.CREAT_PGM , A.UDT_ID , U2.NAME AS UDT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM , A.UDT_PGM , 'U' AS DATA_CHK FROM TB_CR05M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , CLMN_NO , SUM(NVL(CLMN_DTL_AMT, 0)) AS CLMN_DTL_AMT FROM TB_CR05D01 GROUP BY CO_CD , CLMN_NO ) AS B ON B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.CLMN_NO = A.CLMN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS S ON S.CLNT_CD = A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U1 ON U1.ID = A.CREAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U2 ON U2.ID = A.UDT_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}

, NVL(A.ORDRS_AMT, 0) AS ORDRS_AMT , P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ AS CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV , R3.CODE_NM AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV_NM , P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ, 1)) || ' 차' AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0) AS CLMN_RATE , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0)) || ' %' AS CLMN_RATE_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) AS CLMN_AMT , TO_CHAR(P.BILL_PBLS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.CLMN_NO = #{clmnNo}

SELECT CODE_ID AS CODE_ID , CODE_NM AS CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 AS A WHERE A.CODE_KIND = 'PMNTMTD'
AND A.CODE_ID = #{codeId}

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CLMN_NO) IS NULL THEN 'CLMN'||SUBSTR(#{clmnDt}, 3, 2)||'00001' ELSE 'CLMN'||SUBSTR(#{clmnDt}, 3, 2)||LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(CLMN_NO), -5)) + 1, 5, 0) END AS MNGM_NO FROM TB_CR05M01 WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND CLMN_DT LIKE SUBSTR(#{clmnDt}, 0, 4)||'%'
